item.description:
Because it's difficult to form a book club (as many of us don't want to read something specific with a due date) so we'll try something different.

Lazer recommended that we watch this:  http://youtu.be/4Z9WVZddH9w

 

Todd & I will be holding a Book Club Style discussion of that feature film on Saturday, Nov. 12, 2011 @ 1:30pm.

 

Potluck if you wish - we'll be providing munchies and drinks as well.  Please watch the whole thing if you wish to participate in this discussion.

 

Many of you know our address already, but new yay-sayers will be provided with our address the week of.  See you there!

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Book Club Style Discussion
